content: feel spook-tacular this halloween season with this bewitching boho bag with a stunning mesh like fabric highlighting the shiny bright orange fabric beneath the halloween purse is both stylish and practical this bag is made from 100% cotton yarn a quick a fun crochet project line with orange satin or switch out the color to match your style you are welcome to sell the items you make with this pattern but please give me krazy kabbage a mention in your sales listing and provide a link to my website www krazykabbage com hobby lobby s i love this cotton medium weight 100% cotton in black 450 yards you will need crochet hook size h/8 5mm and a yarn needle to weave in ends gauge 12 single_crochet x 15 row = 4 this pattern uses us terminology stitches and terms used chain chain single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet back post single_crochet bpsc construction the oval base of the bag is made first then the panel then to top section and straps a simple lining is sewn into the bag
